trans-unit.source: Specifies whether smoothing (antialiasing) is applied to lines and curves and the edges of filled areas.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se l'arrotondamento (anti-aliasing) viene applicato alle linee e alle curve e ai bordi delle aree riempite.

trans-unit.source: Default, None, and HighSpeed are equivalent and specify rendering without smoothing applied.
trans-unit.target: Impostazione predefinita, None, e ad alta velocità sono equivalenti e specificano il rendering senza smussatura.

trans-unit.source: AntiAlias and HighQuality are equivalent and specify rendering with smoothing applied.
trans-unit.target: AntiAlias e riprodurre sono equivalenti e specificano il rendering con arrotondamento.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is specified by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.SmoothingMode.None> enumeration, it does not affect text.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà viene specificata utilizzando il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.SmoothingMode.None> enumerazione influisce sul testo.

trans-unit.source: To set the text rendering quality, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property and the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Per impostare la qualità di rendering di testo, utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà e <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is specified by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.SmoothingMode> enumeration, it does not affect areas filled by a path gradient brush.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà viene specificata utilizzando il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.SmoothingMode> enumerazione non influenza le aree riempite con pennello sfumatura percorso.

trans-unit.source: Areas filled by using a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush> object are rendered the same way (aliased) regardless of the setting for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Le aree riempite utilizzando un <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush> oggetto sono visualizzate nello stesso modo (alias) indipendentemente dall'impostazione per il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.
